content.query:
CREATE DATABASE demoDB1
COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_100_BIN2_UTF8;
GO

USE demoDB1
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Admin@123'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL ManagedIdentity
WITH 
IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE demoDataSourceCTEAS
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsepocssd.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = ManagedIdentity
)
GO

USE demoDB1
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

USE demoDB1
GO

CREATE SCHEMA nyctaxi
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyctaxi.PassengerCountStats
WITH(
LOCATION = 'https://synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/nyctaxi/AggData/abc',
DATA_SOURCE = demoDataSourceCTEAS,
FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
)
AS 

SELECT PassengerCount as PassengerCount,
      SUM(TripDistanceMiles) as SumTripDistance_miles,
      AVG(TripDistanceMiles) as AvgTripDistance_miles
      FROM
      OPENROWSET
      (
        BULK  'https://synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
      )
      AS [Result]
      WHERE TripDistanceMiles > 0 and PassengerCount >0
      Group BY PassengerCount
GO

CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Admin@123'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL demoCredential
WITH 
IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-11-16T18:07:21Z&st=2023-11-16T10:07:21Z&spr=https&sig=Ww4Q%2BlP%2BTCbeTmAlCOEt5Q9w8TratgTUwZnhLVDGtYI%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE demoDataSource
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsepocssd.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = demoCredential
)
GO

USE demoDB
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT demoParquetFileFormat
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.employee_New
WITH
(
   DISTRIBUTION = HASH(empName),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
As 
SELECT  * from  dbo.employee
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.employee_New_RR
WITH
(
   DISTRIBUTION = Round_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
As 
SELECT  * from  dbo.employee
GO

SELECT passenger_count as PassengerCount,
      SUM(trip_distance) as SumTripDistance_miles,
      AVG(trip_distance) as AvgTripDistance_miles
INTO dbo.PassengerCountStats0
FROM  dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall

GROUP BY passenger_count;

SELECT * FROM dbo.PassengerCountStats0
ORDER BY PassengerCount;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.NYCTaxi
(
      [DateID] int NOT NULL,
    [MedallionID] int NOT NULL,
    [HackneyLicenseID] int NOT NULL,
    [PickupTimeID] int NOT NULL,
    [DropoffTimeID] int NOT NULL,
    [PickupGeographyID] int NULL,
    [DropoffGeographyID] int NULL,
    [PickupLatitude] float NULL,
    [PickupLongitude] float NULL,
    [PickupLatLong] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [DropoffLatitude] float NULL,
    [DropoffLongitude] float NULL,
    [DropoffLatLong] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [PassengerCount] int NULL,
    [TripDurationSeconds] int NULL,
    [TripDistanceMiles] float NULL,
    [PaymentType] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [FareAmount] money NULL,
    [SurchargeAmount] money NULL,
    [TaxAmount] money NULL,
    [TipAmount] money NULL,
    [TollsAmount] money NULL,
    [TotalAmount] money NULL
)
With
(
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = demoDataSourceExternalTable,
    FILE_FORMAT = demoParquetFileFormatExternal_table
)

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/DP load data from file into table')]

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'NYCTaxiTripSmall' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
    (
    
    [passenger_count] float NULL, 
    [trip_distance] float NULL
 
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
( 
 passenger_count 8,trip_distance 9 )
FROM 'https://synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/NYCTripSmall.parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SalesOrderID,sum(UnitPrice)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/SalesOrderDetail.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY SalesOrderID

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'demo_synapsepocssd_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [demo_synapsepocssd_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://demo@synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.nyctaxi (
	[DateID] int,
	[MedallionID] int,
	[HackneyLicenseID] int,
	[PickupTimeID] int,
	[DropoffTimeID] int,
	[PickupGeographyID] int,
	[DropoffGeographyID] int,
	[PickupLatitude] float,
	[PickupLongitude] float,
	[PickupLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
	[DropoffLatitude] float,
	[DropoffLongitude] float,
	[DropoffLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
	[PassengerCount] int,
	[TripDurationSeconds] int,
	[TripDistanceMiles] float,
	[PaymentType] nvarchar(4000),
	[FareAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[SurchargeAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TaxAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TipAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TollsAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TotalAmount] numeric(19,4)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'NYCTripSmall.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demo_synapsepocssd_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.nyctaxi
GO

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Analyze the NYC Taxi data using Spark and notebooks')]

source:
%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""
   SELECT passengercount,
       SUM(tripdistancemiles) as SumTripDistance,
       AVG(tripdistancemiles) as AvgTripDistance
   FROM nyctaxi.trip
   WHERE tripdistancemiles > 0 AND passengercount > 0
   GROUP BY passengercount
   ORDER BY passengercount
""") 
display(df)
df.write.saveAsTable("nyctaxi.passengercountstats")

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM nyctaxi.passengercountstats") 
display(df.limit(10))
df1 = df.repartition(1)
df1.write.mode("overwrite").csv("/nyctaxi/pipeline/csvfile")
df1.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("/nyctaxi/pipeline/parquetfile")
#Load the NYC Taxi data into the Spark nyctaxi database

%%pyspark
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyctaxi")
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("nyctaxi.trip")

import fsspec as fs
import pandas as pd
adls_account_name = 'synapsepocssd'
sas_key = TokenLibrary.getConnectionString('LS_fsspec')

fsspec_handle = fs.open(
    'abfss://demo@synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/SalesOrderDetail.csv',
    account_name = adls_account_name,
    sas_token = sas_key

with fsspec_handle.open() as f:
    df = pd.read_csv(f)
    print('x')

fsspec_handle_2 = fs.open(
    'abfss://demo@synapsepocssd.dfs.core.windows.net/fsspec.csv',
    account_name = adls_account_name,
    sas_token = sas_key,
    mode='wt'

with fsspec_handle_2.open() as f:
    data.to_csv(f)
    print('x')
